title: Reminder that OCE still has a massive problem with the Chinese player base
body:
Players who are banned in Chinese servers coming over to OCE is making the game unplayable late at night. 
Just got out of another game (4 in a row) where I was queued up with a 4 man premade whos only communication was broken english insults in the champ select and chinese all chat in game. 
I know enough chinese to understand I was being racially bullied in all chat with the other team (also chinese) despite having the most kills and assists with the lowest deaths and that nothing will happen from my reports because its all in chinese. 


something needs to be done about this, or it at least needs to be acknowledged that its a massive problem.

replies.body: Sadly Riot don't even regularly read their forums let alone drop by OCE. The server's going to remain a low elo cesspit fostering toxicity because apparently upholding their core values of player behavior comes second to the $$$ they generate from Chinese transfer students.
